bookmarkTree.notification.success.messag.message: $COUNT$ tabs including "$TITLE$" are bookmarked in a new folder under "$PARENT$.

bookmarkTabs.notification.success.messag.message: $COUNT$ tabs including "$TITLE$" are bookmarked in a new folder under "$PARENT$.

bookmark.notification.notPermitted.messa.message: Failed to get permissions to create bookmarks. Please grant permissions via the configurations of Tree Style Tab.

warnOnCloseTabs.message.message: You are about to close $NUMBER$ tabs. Are you sure you want to continue?

warnOnCloseTabs.warnAgain.message: Warn me when I attempt to close multiple tabs

message.startup.description.1.message: Tree Style Tab is now reborn based on WebExtensions technologies for Firefox 57 and later. Its vertical tab bar is available as one of choosable sidebar panels. If you don't see it yet, hit the

message.startup.description.3.message: button in the toolbar, to activate the sidebar panel.

message.startup.migrateSessions.before.message: Tree structure of tabs on Firefox 56 or olders is not migrated automatically. See

message.startup.migrateSessions.link.lab.message: the instruction for manual migration of tree information

message.startup.requestPermissions.descr.message: ⚠There are some features requiring extra permissions. If you want to activate them, please grant permissions manually.

message.startup.requestPermissions.bookm.message: "Bookmark This Tree" in the context menu on tabs (requires access to bookmarks.)

message.startup.requestPermissions.allUr.message: Don't expand collapsed tree and skip collapsed descendants, while switching focus of tabs via keyboard shortcuts (requires script injection to webpages for detection of keyboard operations.)

message.startup.requestPermissions.tabHi.message: Hide inactive tabs except pinned tabs from the top tab bar (requires permission to hide tabs, and you also need to activate "extensions.webextensions.tabhide.enabled" via "about:config".)

message.startup.userChromeCss.notify.message: How to hide top tab bar and sidebar header?

message.startup.userChromeCss.descriptio.message: Due to restrictions of WebExtensions, Tree Style Tab cannot control Firefox's top tab bar and the sidebar header. If you need to control them, see

note that it is very low level customization, thus there is no guarantee and it can cause troubles on future versions of Firefox. Please try it at your own risk, only when you know what you are doing and if you are confident that you can resolve such troubles by yourself.

context.closeOthers.label.message: Cl&ose Other Tabs except this Tree

config.sidebarPosition.caption.message: Style of contents for the sidebar position

config.sidebarPosition.description.message: *This configuration won't change the position of the sidebar itself. You need to click the switcher in the sidebar header and click "Move Sidebar to Right" manually.

config.scrollbarMode.descriptionForMac.message: *Only "Overlay" will effective on lately versions of macOS.

config.style.none.message: No Decoration (*Please decorate everything by yourself via "Extra style rules for sidebar contents")

config.faviconizePinnedTabs.label.message: Show pinned tabs only with their icon

config.showContextualIdentitiesSelector..message: Show container selector on the "New Tab" button

config.hideInactiveTabs.label.message: Hide inactive tabs except pinned tabs at the top tab bar (*You need to activate "extensions.webextensions.tabhide.enabled" via "about:config" on Firefox 59 and later.)

config.autoAttachOnNewTabCommand.child.message: a child of the current tab

config.autoAttachOnNewTabCommand.sibling.message: a sibling of the current tab

config.autoAttachOnNewTabCommand.nextSib.message: the next sibling of the current tab

config.guessNewOrphanTabAsOpenedByNewTab.message: Guess a new tab as opened by "New Tab" command (like keyboard shortcuts), when it is opened with the URL

config.autoAttachOnNewTabButtonMiddleCli.message: For middle click on the "New Tab" button, open new blank tab as
a child of the current tab
a sibling of the current tab
the next sibling of the current tab

config.autoAttachOnDuplicated.before.message: For middle click on the "Reload" button, duplicate the tab as

config.autoAttachOnDuplicated.child.message: a child of the current tab

config.autoAttachOnDuplicated.sibling.message: a sibling of the current tab

config.autoAttachOnDuplicated.nextSiblin.message: the next sibling of the current tab

config.insertNewChildAt.caption.message: Insertion position of new child tabs

config.insertNewChildAt.noControl.message: No control (respect the decision by Firefox or other tab addons)

config.insertNewChildAt.first.message: Insert to the top of the tree, as the first child

config.insertNewChildAt.end.message: Append to the end of the tree

config.insertNewTabFromPinnedTabAt.capti.message: Insertion position of new tabs from pinned tabs

config.insertNewTabFromPinnedTabAt.noCon.message: No control (respect the decision by Firefox or other tab addons)

config.insertNewTabFromPinnedTabAt.first.message: Insert to the top of the tree, as the first child

config.insertNewTabFromPinnedTabAt.end.message: Append to the end of the tree

config.autoGroupNewTabsDelayOnNewWindow..message: But don't group new tabs opened within
msec when a new window is opened, as a part of tabs opened as "home page".

config.autoGroupNewTabsFromPinned.label.message: Auto-group tabs opened from same pinned tab

config.inheritContextualIdentityToNewChi.message: Inherit the container of the parent tab to a new blank tab

config.moveFocusInTreeForClosedCurrentTa.message: When the current tab is closed as a last child
Focus to the previous tab in the tree
Focus to the next tab always (Firefox's default)
*Firefox's built-in behavior for "browser.tabs.selectOwnerOnClose"="true" works prior to this config.

config.parentTabBehaviorForChanges.capti.message: When a parent tab is moved or closed by someone from outside of the tree sidebar

config.parentTabBehaviorForChanges.alway.message: Treat as a parent always (move or close all descendant tabs also together), whether the tree sidebar is visible or not.
Treat as a parent always, when the tree sidebar is visible. / Treat just as a solo tab, when the tree sidebar is invisible.

config.parentTabBehaviorForChanges.onlyI.message: Treat as a parent by operations inside the tree sidebar. / Treat just as a solo tab, by operations outside the tree sidebar.

config.autoCollapseExpandSubtreeOnAttach.message: When a new tree appears, collapse others automatically

config.autoCollapseExpandSubtreeOnSelect.message: When a tab gets focus, expand its tree and collapse others automatically
Except focus moving caused by current tab closing

config.collapseExpandSubtreeByDblClick.l.message: Double-click on a tab to collapse/expand tree

config.closeParentBehavior.caption.message: When a parent tab is closed with expanded tree

config.closeParentBehavior.replaceWithGr.message: Replace closed parent with a dummy tab and keep the tree

config.closeParentBehavior.promoteFirst.message: Promote the first child tab as the new parent

config.closeParentBehavior.promoteAll.message: Promote all child tabs as the level of the closed parent tab

config.promoteFirstChildForClosedRoot.la.message: Promote the first child tab as the new parent, if the closed parent has no parent

config.closeParentBehavior.detach.message: Liberate child tabs from the tree

config.dropLinksOnTabBehavior.caption.message: When a link or URL string is dropped on a tab

config.dropLinksOnTabBehavior.ask.message: Always ask me how to treat it

config.warnOnCloseTabs.label.message: Warn me when I attempt to close multiple tabs

config.userStyleRules.label.message: Extra style rules for sidebar contents

config.legacyConfigsNextMigrationVersion.message: Migrate configurations from the config level

config.importedConfigsFromLegacy.placeho.message: Paste migration data for old configuration here

migration.configs.notification.title.message: Tree Style Tab: Configurations are successfully migrated

migration.configs.notification.message.message: Configurations are applied from the old version.

migration.configsFailed.notification.tit.message: Tree Style Tab: Failed to migrate configurations

migration.configsFailed.notification.mes.message: Migration process is aborted due to unexpected problem.

config.migrateSessionStore.link.label.message: the instruction for manual migration of tree information

config.migrateLegacyTreeStructure.label.message: Migrate tree of tabs at the next startup

config.importedTreeStructureFromLegacy.p.message: Paste migration data for old tree here

migration.tree.notification.title.message: Tree Style Tab: Tree of tabs are successfully migrated

migration.tree.notification.message.with.message: $COUNT$ window(s) are restored completely, with previous session information.
$COUNT$ window(s) are restored only their tree structure. Tabs in those windows don't have any previous session information.

migration.treeFailed.notification.title.message: Tree Style Tab: Failed to migrate tree of tabs

migration.treeFailed.notification.messag.message: Migration process is aborted due to unexpected problem.

config.simulateSVGContextFill.label.message: Activate workaround for the Bug 1388193 and Bug 1421329 to simulate SVG icons (*This may increase CPU usage. To deactivate this option, you need to activate "svg.context-properties.content.enabled" via "about:config", until these bugs are fixed.)

config.acccelaratedTabDuplication.label.message: Accelarate operations around tab duplication (*NOTE: You'll see unstable behavior around tabs.)

config.maximumAcceptableDelayForTabDupli.message: Abort tab duplication when it takes

config.preventUnexpectedFocusToLastPinne.message: Make effort to prevent unexpected focus to a pinned tab after closing of the current tab, while inactive tabs are hidden at the top tab bar

config.requestPermissions.allUrls.message: Don't expand collapsed tree and skip collapsed descendants, while switching focus of tabs via keyboard shortcuts. (*You need to allow executing scripts on webpages.)

config.requestPermissions.fallbackToTool.message: Click the "Tree Style Tab" toolbar button
Due to Firefox's bug, you cannot request permission from this screen. Please click the "Tree Style Tab" toolbar button to grant permissions.
